description: This source file defines the implementation of the PostMortem method within the Server class of the WPEFramework's PluginHost namespace. It handles requests for generating post-mortem dumps in response to specific conditions related to a service and connection context.

classes.name: Server
classes.description: A class within WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace that contains static methods, including PostMortem, for managing server-related functionalities.

methods.name: void PostMortem(Service & service,const IShell::reason why,RPC::IRemoteConnection * connection)
methods.description: A static method that initiates a post-mortem dump process for a given service, depending on the connection type and the reason for dumping.

ctags.name: PostMortem
ctags.pattern: /^\/* static *\/ void Server::PostMortem(Service& service, const IShell::reason why, RPC::IRemoteC/
